Package ch.ethz.inf.vs.persistingservice.resources.persisting

Class Summary
DeviceInfoResource The Class DeviceInfoResource is used to retrieve information about the device, by accessing its well known core resource.
DevicePathResource The Class DeviceResource keeps track of the source device.
ObservingResource The Class ObservingResource keeps track, whether the task observes the source or uses polling.
OptionsResource The Class OptionsResource keeps track of the options specified for the task.
PersistingResource The Class PersistingResource holds all the subresources for a single task.
RunningResource The Class RunningResource keeps track of the running status of the task.
TypeResource The Class TypeResource keeps track of the type of data to be stored of the task.
